0110110110000011 0010000101001111 0 -> sum: 1000111011010010, cout: 0

0010111011011101 1010100101011110 0 -> sum: 1101100000111011, cout: 0
0010011001010001 0000010001000001 1 -> sum: 0010101010010011, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
